com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.domainrep.rdm.directory

Class Service.ServiceInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.domainrep.rdm.directory.Service.ServiceInfo
  • Enclosing interface:
    Service

    public static class Service.ServiceInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    The RDM Service Info. Contains information provided by the Source Directory Info filter.
    See Also:
    Service.ServiceInfoFlags, ServiceImpl
